#summary Hello world and other introductory programs.

= Hello World =

{{{
module HelloWorld 
{
  methods 
  {
    Main() 
    {
      Console.WriteLine("Hello World");
    }
  }
}
}}}

= Fibonacci =

{{{
module Squares
{
  fields
  {
    max = 10;
  }
  methods
  {
    Square(n : Int) : Int
    {
      return n * n;
    }
    Main() 
    {
      foreach (i in 0..max)
        Console.WriteLine(Square(i));
    }
  }
}
}}}
